name: Handyroach
description:
You play as a cockroach who lives in an old arcade machine. One day a sore loser breaks the machine. You need to fix it before your home is thrown out.

When you complete a level, the next one will be loaded.

Controls:

WASD (left stick for controllers) - for movement

E (RB for controllers) - to cycle through selectable objects

SPACE (X/A for controllers) - to interact

Bugs:

Sometimes the selected object stays selected when the player is no longer in range, and cannot be unselected. If that happens, sadly, you will have to restart the game. Sorry for the inconvenience.
